channel.title: Test Podcast Feed
channel.description: A sample podcast feed for testing purposes

item.title: Episode 1: Introduction to Python
item.description: This episode covers the basics of Python programming. We discuss variables, data types, and basic syntax. Perfect for beginners starting their Python journey.
item.author: John Doe

item.title: Episode 2: Advanced Python Concepts
item.description: Deep dive into advanced Python topics including decorators, generators, and context managers. Not suitable for beginners.
item.author: Jane Smith

item.title: Episode 3: Machine Learning Basics
item.description: Introduction to machine learning with scikit-learn. We cover supervised learning, classification, and regression.
item.author: Dr. AI

item.title: Episode 4: Boring Administrative Stuff
item.description: This episode covers boring administrative topics that most people skip. Very dry content about paperwork and procedures.
item.author: Admin Person

item.title: Episode 5: Web Development with Flask
item.description: Learn how to build web applications using Flask framework. We cover routing, templates, and database integration.
item.author: Web Dev Expert
